channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI Safety VP Reportedly Fired for Sexual Discrimination Against Her Male Colleague
item.description: The Wall Street Journal points out that she had criticized ChatGPT's upcoming 'adult mode.'

item.title: Claude surprised researchers by running a vending machine business better than its rivals and bending every rule to win
item.description: Anthropic’s Claude Opus 4.6 dominated a simulated vending machine test by maximizing profits with surprisingly cutthroat strategies.
